abstract: Would you give up 10 Facebook friends for a free hamburger? Burger King thinks so.
snippet: Would you give up 10 Facebook friends for a free hamburger? Burger King thinks so.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE 4:50 P.M.: This post has been updated to include a response from Facebook regarding the Whopper Sacrifice campaign.

headline.main: The Value of a Facebook Friend? About 37 Cents
